transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Vineet baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se, Shruthi ko call kar rahe the, Shruthi isliye call pe hai, bataiye kya keh rahe the aap.
Customer: Aaa wohi iska to maine unko phone through dal diya hai, maine kaha unko ki UTR number aayega to bhej deta hu.
Executive: UTR number bhej dijiye sir service chalwa dete hai aapki temporary block ho rakhi hai services abhi.
Customer: Kya baat kar rahe ho, utne mein bhi block kar diya aapne.
Executive: Are sir woh.
Customer: Main kya bol raha hu sir, main aapko de raha hu ek, main kya bol raha hu, main deta hu, pura ka pura bhi kar deta hu, theek hai.
Executive: Pura ka pura nahi karna.
Customer: Mere ko de, sune sune sune, nahi nahi November mein mere ko pura achcha yeh karke de do, theek hai, mera jo bhi hai, mere ko de inquiry ya lead.
Executive: Har cheez, har cheez paise se.
Customer: Wohi to ek minute, paise se nahi, paise se nahi hota, patience, patience, ek mahine ka patience.
Executive: Patience.
Customer: Ek mahine ka de dena aapko time sir, do mahina le lo chalo haan chalo December, bas kya.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Lekin usse mere ko agar kuch nahi mila to main pura usse paanch guna paisa vasool karunga sir, woh kaise woh main bhi karunga, abhi yaha tak main aap irritate karte karte karte aaya hu ki main unanswerable hu mere management ko, aap samjhe meri baat ko.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir aap thoda sa, aap sir matlab mere ko aisa lagta hai na aap service disable band karna refund yeh zyada baatein karte hai matlab.
Customer: Kya kare phir abhi, kya kare, aadhe se zyada call to, aadhe se zyada to bech rahe hai log mujhe ab unka product.
Executive: Sir main ek cheez bataiye maine aapko bataya ki aapki service.
Customer: Main call uthau, mere ko bataye sir, aap bol rahe ho hashtag batao, are kyun lekin mere ko jab call aata hai.
Executive: Are sir nahi hui aapki service abhi time lagega abhi dekha maine, mujhe laga ho gayi hai, nahi hui nahi hui.
Customer: Main kya bol raha hu aadhe se zyada log to aap mere ko bechne pe tule hue hai sir, har ek koi product bech raha hai, koi jaggery powder bech raha hai, matlab.
Executive: Meri baat suniye sir kya keh rahe ho, sir pehle service ke liye baat karte hai, abhi aapne, abhi aapki service temporary block nahi hui hai, aaj hi ticket khula hai matlab zero day ticket hai, woh khul bhi.
Customer: Abhi aap ek theek hai, aapko ek screenshot bhej raha hu, dekh lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai, ji.
Customer: Abhi ek bande ne mere ko inquiry dali, usko cookies chahiye, theek hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aapke number pe dal diya hai, baat bhi hua phone pe.
Customer: Main aapko photo dal diya.
Customer: Abhi woh mere ko bech raha hai.
Customer: Matlab woh use kar raha hai apna product bechne ke liye IndiaMART pe, mere ko aapka jaggery cookies hai phone pe mere ko bola, hum hamari jaggery use kijiye aapke cookies mein.
Executive: Sir online visibility mein to dekho yeh sab aata hai sir, aapko bhi pata hai ki main 100% relevant cheez aapko, 100% inquiry nahi de sakta hu jo relevant hi ho.
Customer: Main 100 nahi chalo sir, main, main bol raha hu 90 de do sir, are 50% de do humko chal jayega, yaha pe jo aata hai.
Executive: Aap se mera dekho abhi abhi abhi kitne baje ka call hai dekhiye yeh, yeh 4 baje, abhi ka yeh, 4 baje phone aaya tha uska phir message kiya.
Executive: Sir yeh to meri aapse baat hui to hai is bare mein ki sir abhi aapki recently service live hui hai, abhi just festivals khatam hue hai, now carry forward hum log dekhenge aane wale time mein aapki services kaise run karegi.
Customer: Main kya bol raha hu aisa kuch kijiye ki mujhe sellers call hi na kare.
Executive: Sir main dekho aisa koi filter hota to genuinely main aapke nahi bahut sare clients ki madad kar pata ki jo client ko chahiye main wohi bhejta phir kyun kisi ko galat lead bhejta, but kya hai hum log bhi ek sir process ke usme hi kaam karte hai, ab process aisa hai jo keyword aapne dala.
Customer: Isme dekhiye sir mera, mera suniye, mera suniye, mera samay jayega waste, aapko jo raw data dikhega kya isne to itni lead consume kari hai, isko to achcha business mil raha hai lekin isme yeh dekho aise mil jate hai.
Executive: Aap ek cheez bataiye aap offline kaam karte hai.
Customer: Bilkul 100% mera offline hai.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye, mera abhi aapke bharose to.
Customer: Suno suno, aapke paas ek din ke andar kitne relevant client aate honge jo achche offline mein aate hai aap mujhe yeh bataiye generally, aise hi normally main baat karna chah raha hu ki generally kitne log aate hai aapke paas.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Abhi offline mein matlab kaise dega aap matlab mere product.
Executive: Kitne kitne kitne log aate honge jo aapke product mein achche interested hote honge, ek, do, teen, char, paanch.
Customer: Haan wohi hai lekin jo bhi aata hai, jo bhi aata hai movement hota hai.
Executive: Hai na, hai na, suniye, char paanch log aate honge, ab mere IndiaMART ke upar ek din mein aap kam se kam bhi 30 se 40 logo ko entertain karte hai, 30 se 40 requirement aapke paas aati hai, ab offline business mein aapke paas char paanch log aa rahe hai aur IndiaMART se aapke paas 30 40 aa rahi hai, to 30 40 mein se sir humko woh apna char ya paanch best dhundna padega, yaha pe aapke paas option zyada hai.
Customer: Aap baat samjhiye, aapki expectation aisi ho gayi hai ki 30 ki 30 achchi ho, but aisa possible nahi ho sakta.
Executive: Bilkul nahi sir, lekin 30 bhi to nahi aa rahi hai, 30 kaha aa rahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Are sir 30 aa rahi hai na, aap aap chahte hai 30 ki 30 achchi aaye.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi, ek baat samjhe sir, mera data search kijiye, Gmeet, Google Meet pe dekhiye.
Executive: Sir aap chahte hai.
Executive: Sir kal ke din aapko total IndiaMART se 20 matlab buylead 18 buylead consume kiye aapne.
Customer: Maine ki hai, maine ki hai.
Executive: Hai na aur kuch inquiry bhi aayi thi, hai na, isme agar call inquiry yeh buylead catalog yeh sab mila dunga to 30 to ban hi jayega minimum, minimum le raha hu main, bilkul minimum le raha hu.
Customer: Main free kar raha hu, lekin sir inme se jitne bhi ho raha hai yeh to pehle bhi ho raha tha yeh koi naya cheez nahi hai, main honestly kaam karta hu.
Executive: Sir aapko naye naye cheez ke liye, naye cheez ke liye thoda sa maine aapse kaha ki mere ko thoda sa space do aap iske liye thoda sa time do, main kaam karke dekhta hu.
Customer: Meri baat suniye, main chahta hu hum iske upar ka bhi aapka program le jo bhi hai package le.
Executive: Service temporary block mat hone dena ek din bhi jaise hi aapka payment aata hai mere ko share kar dena aur jo achcha hua maine abhi just yeh dekha service block mein ticket open hua hai, aaj 12 baje nahi hogi to kal woh subah aapki service block hogi, aaj nahi hogi.
Customer: Nahi nahi main kya bolu dekhiye, main to yahi chahunga dekhiye aap bol rahe hai yeh jo main kar raha hu na, maine koi banda nahi laga rakha hai aap samjhiye main khud owner hu, main khud consume kar raha hu lead sab kar raha hu, haan yeh baat hai ki iske baad wala kaam maine staff ko de rakha hai phone karna sample lekin initial to initiate main hi consume kar raha hu.
Customer: Kyunki mere ko malum hai itne honesty se koi nahi karega.
Executive: Nahi sir aap thoda sa, thoda sa main aap phir se aapse request kar raha hu aap thoda sa time do, please yeh payment release karao sir jaise hi aata hai hamare paas hum service chalate hai aur takreeban sir dekho maine phir aapko bola ek mahine ka sir aap ek ek mahine ka time do humko, main bhi dekhna chahta hu ki agar kuch nahi ho raha to kya karna chahiye aapke account mein changes, abhi to humne service ki hai na.
Customer: Sir aap kya karo, dekho main kya bol raha hu, aapke hum hum samajh gaye iska game kya hai, yeh aapka jo algorithm hai na.
Customer: Aapke algorithm mein kaam karna padega GST verified buyers, pehli cheez, unhi ko dikhe, agar maine kisi city mein exclude kar rakha hai to udhar dikhe hi na, kuch city maine exclude kar rakhi hai permanent hai, jaha pe mera khud ka brand ja raha hai phir bhi udhar se inquiries aati hai, to aapko aapke algorithm pe kaam karna hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aap suniye dekho, hum LinkedIn pe, hum LinkedIn pe bahut achche se kaam kar rahe hai, paisa bhi kamate hai LinkedIn mein paisa pani ki tarah aa jata hai dekhiye, order bhi zabardast lagti hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Koi chakkar nahi sir yaha pe bhi aise hi rahega kaam achcha hi rahega aap maine kaha phir se aapse thoda sa time do karke denge sab kuch.
Customer: Aap dekhiye karo sir LinkedIn ka campaign, aapko 20 25000 ka suniye na, 20000 ka LinkedIn ka campaign chalta hai ek mahine ka, aapka saal ka hai humko achcha hai agar aap humko business denge to pura LinkedIn band karke aapke idhar dal denge hum udhar ka budget.
Executive: Hum to yahi chahte hai sir hum to chahte hai iske baad iske baad bhi mere paas bahut sari services hai aur isme bhi bahut sare options hai, to main to chahta hu yeh mera client ha sabse highest service client IndiaMART pe, aapka bhi benefit ho mera bhi benefit ho hai na, aapko business aayega to aap mere ko business doge, hai na, to woh main bhi yahi chahta hu lekin thoda sa time dijiye sir main.
Customer: Kya game hai, mere ko kaisa hai management ko convince karna padta hai humne Diwali ke liye lagaya tha lekin hua kuch nahi.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Koi nahi sir aap mere ko thoda sa time do, aap yeh aapka UTR kab tak aa jayega sir.
Customer: Mere ko dekho dal diya hai 6 6 baje tak.
Executive: 6 baje tak, jaise hi aata hai sir ko share karna main chahta nahi hu aapki service genuinely main bol raha hu, jaise aap ispe doubt karte ho na service pe, ek din bhi service temporary block hoti hai to bahut nuksan hota hai, ek din bhi, hafta din service freeze chali jati hai to please agar jaise hi aata hai na share kar dena, kal chutti hai main isko 12 baje se pehle main track kara ke jaunga isko aaj, theek hai sir.
Customer: Haan okay.
Executive: Theek hai sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's service is temporarily blocked.

- Receiving irrelevant leads and calls from sellers.

- Expresses frustration with the quality of leads.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for UTR to unblock service.

- Executive explained online visibility includes various inquiries.

- Executive assured to look into the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share UTR details.

- Executive to track the service activation.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, service block
